item.description:
Yet again.. It's been too long since we've had a Boston CiviCRM Meetup!

Come on out to connect to the local CiviCRM community -- whether you're an end user, a consultant, a developer, or a non-profit exploring whether CiviCRM can handle your needs.

What do folks want this session to be?

I made a survey with some possible topics to see what folks might want to focus on:
https://docs.google.com/a/webstaq.org/spreadsheet/viewform?formkey=dGYwalQwTE4zZkk2V25PQWhydzRralE6MQ

Hope people are still out there and Civi-ing it up!
item.name: Boston CiviCRM Meetup: Rise from the ashes!
